#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
int sz=0,dp[100005];
vector<int> conv;

int canConvert(int diff){
	if(diff<0) return 0;
	int& res=dp[diff];
	if(res!=-1) return res;
	if(diff==0) return 1;
	res=0;
	for(int k=0;k<sz;k++){
		int sub=conv[k]-1;
		if(sub>diff) break;
		if(canConvert(diff-sub)){
			res=1;
			break;
		}
	}
	return res;
}

int main(int argc, char const *argv[]){
	int x,n,y,temp;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&temp);
		if(temp!=1){
			conv.push_back(temp);
			sz++;
		}
	}
	sort(conv.begin(),conv.end());
	for(int i=0;i<100005;i++) dp[i]=-1;
	if(canConvert(y-x)) printf("POSSIBLE\n");
	else printf("IMPOSSIBLE\n");
	return 0;
}
